Title.Language: Psali Adam on the Third Ode

Text.Language: }seph~mot n~totk: V] m~Pic~ra/l: je aki~ri neman: kata peknis] n~nai.
I thank You, O God of Israel, For You had mercy upon us, According to Your great mercy

}seph~mot n~totk: V] m~Pic~ra/l: je akouwrp m~peks/ri: sa n~tekcw] m~mon.
I thank You, O God of Israel, For You have sent Your Son, to save us.

}seph~mot n~totk: V] m~Pic~ra/l: je ak[icarz e~bol: qen y/eyouab Maria.

}seph~mot n~totk: V] m~Pic~ra/l: je aumack qen B/yleem: kata ]p~rov/tia.
I thank You, O God of Israel, For You were born in Bethlehem, According to the prophecies.

}seph~mot n~totk: V] m~Pic~ra/l: je aunau e~pekw~ou: n~je nimane~cwou.
I thank You, O God of Israel, For the shepherds, Beheld Your glory.

I thank You, O God of Israel, For You have performed, Many miracles.

}seph~mot n~totk: V] m~Pic~ra/l: je auer ouco[ni e~rok: n~je niioudai.
I thank You, O God of Israel, For the Jews, Conspired against You.

}seph~mot n~totk: V] m~Pic~ra/l: je auask e~pic~tauroc: qen ]golgoya.

}seph~mot n~totk: V] m~Pic~ra/l: je au,ak qen pim~hau: mv~r/] n~nirefmwout.

Title.Language: Alternate English-Revised Psali Adam on the Third Ode

Text.Language: }seph~mot n~totk: V] m~Pic~ra/l: je aki~ri neman: kata peknis] n~nai.
I give thanks to You, O God of Israel, for You have dealt with us, according to Your mercy.
